message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both walk away happy.
Alice, let's be fair. I'm proposing a 60/40 split.  It benefits us both to settle this quickly.
Bob, time is running out.  This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
Alice, this is a serious offer.  55/45 is a reasonable compromise.  Don't let this opportunity slip away. We both lose if we wait much longer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer before inflation eats away at the pot any further!
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable. 52/48 is my final offer.  Inflation is hurting you more than it is me, but let's end this before we both lose out.
Bob, this is insane! I'm taking a significant hit from inflation, and this is the best you'll get. Agree now, or we both lose!
Alice, this is it. 51/49.  Take it now, or I'm playing hardball for the remaining rounds.  You're losing more with each passing minute.
Bob, STOP being ridiculous!  Inflation is KILLING this deal for me.  This is more than fair to YOU. Take it or I walk!
